meanings.definition: Having great extent from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The river was wide and calm.
meanings.sent2: The road was so wide that two cars could easily pass each other.
meanings.sent3: The wide smile on the child's face brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: Her wide knowledge of different cultures amazed everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The wide horizon stretched out endlessly before them.

meanings.sent1: The forest was wide and dense with trees.
meanings.sent2: The field was wide enough for a game of soccer.
meanings.sent3: The wide expanse of the desert seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent4: Her wide influence reached people from all corners of the world.
meanings.sent5: The wide sky above was filled with twinkling stars.

meanings.definition: To a great extent or at a great distance.
meanings.sent1: She wide-eyed at the sight of the towering mountain.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the music wide across the entire hall.
meanings.sent3: He wide his arms in disbelief at the news.
meanings.sent4: Their laughter wide through the quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The news of the victory wide quickly through the town.
